newsitem.title: POLAND: Pope leaves homeland at end of Polish trip.
newsitem.headline: Pope leaves homeland at end of Polish trip.

text.p: Pope John Paul left Poland for Rome on Tuesday at the end of an 11-day pilgrimage to his homeland.
A Polish LOT airlines plane carrying the Pope and his entourage took off from the airport of Krakow in southern Poland at 7.43 p.m. (1743 GMT) for the two-hour flight.
